author: qu0b
content: There is no hurry to tear it down so go ahead and let me know how you progress

author: joshklop
content:
Thanks <@577788234810130432> . We tried today but ran into some issues with inconsistent rpc responses from `https://rpc.bal-devnet-1.ethpandaops.io/`. From the outside it appears that a node is stalled, for example a balance was sometimes not updating--we tried hitting the upstream nodes directly but those require auth.

Is there a way for us to check the status of the nodes on the devnet to know for sure?
